undertale_death_screen.config.shard_rend:
Configures the style of the shattered heart pieces.
  Animated: The piece will animate but not rotate.
  Rotated: The piece will rotate but will not be animated.
undertale_death_screen.config.music_turn: Whether to stop all sound & music whenever you die
undertale_death_screen.config.centered_h: Whether to center the heart in the middle.

Whether to smoothly animate the heart to the center of the
screen before shattering.
Speed of the heart center animation.
undertale_death_screen.config.determinat: Whether to play music (by default Determination from Undertale) on the death screen.
